group_1.textLeft: Phew...
Miyu, you're starting to do a lot better in the way@you move.

group_1.textRight: Th-thank you sooo much...!

group_1.textLeft: But I'm going to refine it further.
Your movements are still too stiff for@a performance meant to entertain the god.

group_1.textRight: Urgh... I will try harder and harder for your sake,@Lady San...!

group_1.textCenter: Next, let's fix the float! Just don't get too pumped@up and get yourself hurt!

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, I suppose that concludes our@dance rehearsal.

group_1.textRight: Whaaat?@But Miyu can still work even harder!

group_1.narration: "Oi, you, hold that side up!"@"Do it yourself!"

group_1.textLeft: It looks like they've started repairing the floats.
At this rate, you won't even be able to hear@the music tape, will you?

group_1.textRight: That might be true, but...

group_1.textLeft: It's a good sign when you can hear them@getting ready.
Let's also do what we can for the Festival.

group_1.textRight: Then, what are we going to do...?

group_1.textLeft: Let's be realistic here...@We need a fundraiser.
The Chairman said he'd take care of it,
but we're still losing sponsors and the funding's@still tight.

group_1.textRight: I see, I see!
We're going to support the Festival by collecting@as many donations as we can, right?!

group_1.textLeft: Precisely. We have to start by taking action.

group_1.textRight: Yes, Lady San!

group_1.textLeft: We need your help to raise funds to hold the@Hikarizuka Fire Festival, please!

group_1.textRight: Pleeease!
Lady Saaan... Two hours have passed, and we still@haven't collected aaany donations...

group_1.textLeft: What a pain...@After all, this is beyond my expectation...
(I didn't think they'd be so uninterested...)
(This means the people who believe in gods@even if they can't see them...)
(...are far more uncommon than I thought...)
...If we were gods, I bet we'd be getting donations@in no time.
Oh, as if...

group_1.textRight: [chara:103201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!@[wait:0.8][chara:103201:cheek_0][chara:103201:lipSynch_1]Maybe that's it!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Miyu, that was just a joke, 'kay?

group_1.textRight: Speaking of things to be grateful for, there's always@Lady San's hallowed legs!
How about we begin collecting donations@in your name like this, Lady San?!
If it's me, I'll give you as much offerings—@No, donations— as possible!!

group_1.textLeft: Absolutely not.

group_1.textRight: Right...

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, it might have been easier to receive@attention and donations...
...if we had some tricks and charisma@to attract people's interest.

group_1.textRight: From Miyu's point of view, you're charismatic@enough, thooough...
Plus, it'd be a bit scary if you became like@the Magius...

group_1.textLeft: Ah...@Well, those three were something else.
I'm not built to be on top like they were...
While I've heard rumors that some Magical Girls...
...have restarted a new "Wings of the Magius",
I don't think they can lead the organization@as well as Lady Touka and the others.

group_1.textRight: Indeed... I can't imagine it...

group_1.textLeft: ...Now, seeing as we have no success,@let's call a halt to the fundraising.

group_1.textRight: Now then, now then, what shall we do next...?

group_1.textLeft: Let's conduct an event to inform people of the god@worshipped at Hikarizuka Shrine and the Fire Festival.
Even if they don't hold much faith in the gods,@as long as they take an interest,
I believe they'll understand that the Fire Festival@is not all danger.

group_1.textRight: But, I don't really know much about the god and@the Festival...

group_1.textLeft: As I don't think I understand all the details either...
Perhaps we should have a real professional tell us.
